item.description: Well, Canyon Cafe has closed, so we are trying a new location. Join us for Stump Team Trivia at Firefly's in Framingham. Trivia starts at 7:30pm. We will meet at 7pm to get a spot. Join us for drinks, food and a fun time playing team trivia. Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 0000. We will meet in the bar area.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) in bar area. If need to, please call 774 232 0000
item.name: Stump Team Trivia at Firefly's Framingham
